detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a flounce trim at the sides. One pair with an all-over print.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, wide, bell sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in taffeta with a deep V-neck, concealed zip at the back, half-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning. Satin lining.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist and hips. High waist, a high cut at the back and a lined gusset. Laser-cut edges around the waist and hems for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist and hips. High waist, a high cut at the back and a lined gusset. Laser-cut edges around the waist and hems for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shirt in a soft organic cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and double-layered yoke. Open chest pocket, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Boxy-style top in patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a rib-trimmed neckline and sleeves with jersey-lined, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a long-sleeved jumper and trousers in garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with a round neck, raglan sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed, roll-edge hems.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in sturdy organic cotton jersey with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Joggers in washed denim made from organic cotton and Tencel™ lyocell. Elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Parka in lightweight, patterned cotton canvas with a detachable, lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Yoke with a pleat at the back, bellows front pockets with a flap and press-stud, covered elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt and jersey-lined trousers in a cotton weave. Shirt with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, patch front pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Detachable elastic braces that can be adjusted with a button.

Blouse in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell weave with a wide, round neckline, short elasticated sleeves, shimmering buttons down the front and a flared peplum.

Wide blouse in a crinkled weave with lace trims and embroidered details. V-shaped opening at the top, a seam under the bust and at the hem and long, wide sleeves with pleats and covered elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Lined.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Zip-through hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Jersey lined, printed hood with ear appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and patch front pockets in the shape of paws with a print. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in glittery jersey with wide, covered elastication at the waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

Fitted top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a sheen. V-neck, a double-layered wrapover at the top and a seam under the bust. Long, wide sleeves with gathered elastication at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs.

Set in soft cotton jersey. Two T-shirts with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and rib trim around the neckline. Two patterned vest tops with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Two pairs of shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
